name: Under The Bridge
description:
AS SEEN AT ACMI - MELBOURNE  INTERNATIONAL GAMES WEEK!

Under the Bridge is a 2D pixel art troll game inspired by such games as "I wanna be the Guy" and "Kaizo Mario". Where the goal was to create levels which require a non linear thought process in order to complete and still being able to maintain a pace that suits a variety of players. We want our players to learn from their mistakes as they progress, only to flip everything completely on its head at the same time. The Pixel Art used is a stylistic choice which suites the particular game genre, it keeps it simple while still pleasing to the eye.

Please show our wonderful hard working team some support by providing a small donation and let us know how far you got in the game before you raged!

Controls:

A - left  D - Right  :   Or use LEFT arrow and RIGHT arrow

Space: Jump

Notes:

Only available for Windows :)

Known Issues:

> If lag occurs set the "Graphics Quality" to medium.

> Level 2 + 3 are missing in game background visuals which makes spikes hard to see

> Level 3 is missing death counter due to a small fix 

Team:

Tamara Vaughan - Visuals (Art) / Level Design

Michael Bojczuk  - Programming / Level Design

John Nguyen - Programming / Level Design
